highlight.title: Highlight
highlight.description: Highlight the execution time on completion

positioning.title: Positioning
positioning.description: How to position the execution time. Possible values are: "left", "right" or "hover".

minTime.title: Minimum time to display (s)
minTime.description: Minimum cell execution time in seconds to show timing info (0 means always)

textContrast.title: Text Contrast
textContrast.description: Text color contrast. Possible values are: "high", "low".

showLiveExecutionTime.title: Show Live Execution Time
showLiveExecutionTime.description: Show the current execution time (last execution time) as a cell executes.

showDate.title: Show Last Execution Date
showDate.description: Show the date of last cell execution.

historyCount.title: History of Cell Execution Time
historyCount.description: Show the historical N previous execution times since the notebook was opened as a tooltip (0 to disabled)

dateFormat.title: Date format
dateFormat.description: Show the formatted date string in the given format. For example "yyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" results in "2023-02-28 14:25:57 ", "dd/MM/YYY HH:mm:ss (O)" results in "28/02/2023 14:25:57 (GMT +3)". Find out more on unicode date field symbols on this link [https://www.unicode.org/reports/tr35/tr35-dates.html#Date_Field_Symbol_Table]
